testCases.explanation: Two duplicates (one extra 2 and one extra 3) need to be changed, requiring 2 operations.
All elements are already distinct, 0 operations needed.
Three extra 1s must be changed to make all distinct, requiring 3 operations.
Two extra 3s and one extra 2 need changing, 3 operations total.

description: Given an array `nums`, find the minimum number of operations to make all elements distinct. In one operation, you can increment any element by 1.

examples.explanation: Change one 2 to 4 and one 3 to 5 (or other valid assignments), 2 operations.
